attributes.action: MAKE ALL TRAIN OPERATING FRANCHISES INCLUDE 24 HOUR TRAIN SERVICES BETWEEN UK LARGEST CITIES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is astonishing to me that we do NOT have round the clock train services between our largest cities -LONDON,GLASGOW, EDINBURGH, ABERDEEN, INVERNESS,EXETER, BIRMINGHAM, MANCHESTER, LIVERPOOL ETC.
Many passengers would love to have a day out in London and want to stay for a theatre or to have dinner with friends -and many other important reasons.
